bill.summary:
Applauds public and private school officials who are trying to improve the history curriculum in secondary schools in the United States
Calls on school officials to reexamine such curriculum to ensure fair and up-to-date teaching of the developments of modern day Russia. Calls on publishers of history textbooks to include more information and additional points of view regarding Russian history in new versions of textbooks or as supplementary materials.
